info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:44AM MDT until June 23 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM MDT FOR EASTERN MORA AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTIES... At 1243 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Wagon Mound, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 372 and 407. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
